薶字的基本解释

薶
mái
古同“埋”，埋葬：“生薶工匠，计以万数。”

薶
wō
沾污：“夫鉴明者，尘垢弗能薶。”

薶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mái］
［《廣韻》莫皆切，平皆，明。］
(1)埋葬。“埋”的本字。
(2)填塞。参见“薶掛”。
[②]［wō］
沾污。

薶字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薶； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1062第52
【唐韻】與埋同。【博雅】藏也。【爾雅·釋天】祭地曰瘞薶。【註】旣祭薶藏之。【淮南子·時則訓】掩骼薶骴。　又【類篇】暮拜切，音韎。義同。　又【集韻】陵之切，音釐。【爾雅·釋言】窒薶，塞也。　又【直音】音懷。草名。　又【字彙補】烏魁切，音威。汚也。【淮南子·俶眞訓】鑒明者，塵垢弗能薶。

薶
Basic explanation of words
薶
mái
Gu Tong "buried" and buried: "The number of live craftsmen is tens of thousands."
薶
wō
Contaminated: "He who knows the truth, dust and dirt."
薶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mái］
["Guangyun" is not all cut, plain and bright. ]
(1) Burial. The original word "buried".
(2) Packing. See "薶hang".
[②]［wō］
Stained.
薶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　薶; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1062 Page 52
【Tang Yun】Same as buried. [Bo Ya] Zang Ye. [Erya·Shitian] Sacrifice to the earth is called 無薶. [Note] The sacrifice to the Zangzhi. 【Huainanzi·Shi Zexun】Covering the bones.　[Category] Twilight worships and cuts, Yin Kun. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The cut of the mausoleum, the sound is li. 【Erya·Interpretation】Suffocation, suffocation.　[Straight tone] Yinhuai again. Cursive name.　[Word Supplement] Wukui cut, sound prestige. Dirty too. 【Huainanzi·Fuyixun】The discerning person, dust and dirt.
